name: Energy Ward
summary: You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward.
description:
You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward. Until the start of your next turn, you gain resistance 5 to one type of energy damage dealt by the spell you just cast.Traits

Abjuration: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the abjuration school of magic, typically involving protection or wards.
